src:
Zlatiborski derbi za vrh, Klonferi protiv Pazaraca za prvi trijumf
Na programu je pet utakmica petog kola Košarkaške lige Srbije

02 Nov 2019

Klubovi iz jugozapadne Srbije dominiraju tabelom domaćeg košarkaškog prvenstva. Kada govorimo o situaciji uoči petog kola, prvo mesto pripada čačanskom Borcu, odmah iza je Zlatibor iz Čajetine, a na trećem mestu je užička Sloboda. Veoma blizu nalazi se i ekipa Novog Pazara. Kako sezona odmiče, postavlja se pitanje ko će na kraju regularnog dela zauzeti čelne pozicije i tako obezbediti sebi učešće u ABA 2 ligi za predstojeću godinu.
A deluje da će meč između Zlatibora i Slobode, koji je na programu ove subote na srpskoj planinskoj lepotici, dati bar deo odgovora na to ko je spreman da u ovoj trci ode sve do kraja. I jedni i drugi za sada imaju samo po jedan poraz, tako da u sasvim lepom raspoloženju dočekuju subotnji susret.
Utakmice između ova dva kluba su redovno odlično posećenje, u Užicu često bude po više od 2.000 ljudi, dok ništa manje interesovanje ne vlada ni u Čajetini. U goste uvek dolazi veliki broj gostujućih navijača, za koje je već najavljeno da će imati posebno mesto u hali. Ipak, neretko se dešava da i u samim porodicama jedan član navija za jedan, a drugi za drugi tim.
Bilo kako bilo, Sloboda se nalazi u zaista užasnoj seriji protiv svojih komšija. Ona datira još iz vremena dok su se oba kluba takmičila u Drugoj muškoj ligi Srbije. Prethodne sezone, u Užicu je sve rešeno u poslednjim sekundama, dok je na Zlatiboru domaćin trijumfovao prilično ubedljivo, uz to ubacivši stotku.
Situacija u dva tabora je nešto drugačija u odnosu na prethodnu takmičarsku godinu. Sloboda se odlučila da već u Superligi prethodne godine krene da uigrava mlade snage za novu sezonu, uzevši kod sebe na pozajmicu Dimitrija Nikolića, Tadiju Tadića i Vuka Đorđevića. To im se maksimalno isplatilo, pošto su prva dvojica trenutno statistički jedni od najboljih košarkaša lige. Uz Dušana Kutlešića i Tevina Fostera, čini se da Ere imaju prilično respektabilan sastav.
Nisu bez oružja ni Zlatiborci. Glavna pretnja po Užičane dolazi od Petra Vorkapića, ali dosta pažnje moraće da se obrati i na Bogdana Riznića, koji je već dugo među Čajetincima, kao i Svetozara Popovića koji za sada prosečno beleži neverovatnih 10,8 asistencija po utakmici.
Vrlo zanimljivo moglo bi da bude i na Voždovcu, gde će OKK Beograd pokušati da probije led i dođe do prve pobede u novoj sezoni. Protivnik, ipak, neće biti nimalo lak, pošto će Klonferi ukrstiti koplja sa ekipom Novog Pazara koji se ove sezone takmiči u regionalnoj ABA 2 ligi.
I upravo će domaći igrati na kartu umora gostujuće ekipe, koja je samo tri dana pre ovog duela odigrala meč protiv Dinamika, takođe u glavnom gradu Srbije. U prethodna dva meča, pored umeća košarkaši OKK Beograda nisu imali ni sreće, pošto su u oba navrata poraženi nakon produžetka i to nakon što su pred poslednji minut regularnog dela utakmice vodili.
Dosta je bilo promena u sastavima obe ekipe, a može se reći da i jedni, a i drugi još uvek krpe rupe. Bar za sada, kod Klonfera se ističu Mihailo Jovičić i Aleksa Marković, dok su u Novom Pazaru “glavni” Tarik Brunčević i Aleksa Novaković.
Prošle sezone se Pazarci nisu najbolje proveli u “Mega Fektoriju”, pošto ih je podmlađeni tim OKK Beograda dobio u veoma važnom meču, kada su se borili za drugo mesto na tabeli. Danas su daleko jači, pa bi tim sa jugozapada zaista mogao da ima problema.
Još jedan derbi će se igrati u Aleksincu, bar prema poziciji timova na tabeli. Domaći Napredak se nakon četiri kola potpuno iznenađujuće nalazi na četvrtom mestu na tabeli sa svega jednim porazom i protiv Dinamika će pokušati da potvrdi da ništa od ovoga nije iznenađenje.
Zaista, Aleksinčani su se stoički potrudili da klub što više približe navijačima, prodat je veliki broj sezonskih ulaznica i domaći košarkaši po običaju mogu očekivati lepu podršku na domaćšem terenu. Najviše se očekuje od Slaviše Bogavca, koji je za sada bio najefikasniji član ovog tima, ali pažnju treba usmeriti i ka Aleksandru Ilkiću, koji je prethodne sezone briljirao u dresu Tamiša.
Vršac će na domaćem terenu dočekati uzdrmani Metalac, koji očigledno oseća posledice toga što je dosta kasnije u odnosu na ostale ušao u pripreme za novu sezonu. Valjevci su za sada upisali svega jednu pobedu u domaćem prvenstvu i to na domaćem parketu, dok su u gostima dva puta ubedljivo poraženi. Sa druge strane, tim iz Banata je u sezonu ušao dosta bolje nego protekle sezone, pa se ovoga puta nada da bi mogao da se plasira u Superligu.
Za kraj, tu je i okršaj dva tima iz donjeg dela tabele. Kolubara će ugostiti fenjeraša Vojvodinu koja je u prethodnom kolu bila veoma blizu iznenađujućeg trijumfa protiv Vršca. Stigle su Lale veliki rezultatski zaostatak, ali nisu uspele da preplivaju goste, koji su poenima sa linije za slobodna bacanja na sekund pred kraj došli do vrednog trijumfa.

KOŠARKAŠKA LIGA SRBIJE – 5. KOLO

PetakDunav – Mladost Zemun 89:95

Subota17.00: (4,40) OKK Beograd (17,00) Novi Pazar (1,25)18.00: (1,07) Vršac (25,00) Metalac (8,50)18.00: (1,20) Zlatibor (19,00) Sloboda (5,00)19.00: (1,80) Napredak (14,50) Dinamik (2,15)19.30: (1,25) Kolubara (17,00) Vojvodina (4,40)

Nedelja19.00: Borac – Tamiš

Napomena: 
Kvote su podložne promenama





Piše: Srđan TODOROVIĆ
text:
Zlatibor derby for the top, Klonferi against Pazarac for the first triumph
The program includes five games of the fifth round of the Serbian Basketball League

02 Nov 2019

Clubs from southwestern Serbia dominate the table for the domestic basketball championship. When it comes to the situation on the eve of the fifth round, the first place belongs to the Čačak fighter, right behind is Zlatibor from Čajetina, and in the third place is Uzice Freedom. Very close is the team of Novi Pazar. As the season goes on, the question arises as to who will occupy the leading positions at the end of the regular season, thus securing their participation in the ABA 2 League for the coming year.
And it seems that the match between Zlatibor and Sloboda, which is on the program this Saturday at the Serbian Mountain Beauty, will give at least part of the answer to who is ready to go all the way in this race. Both have only one defeat so far, so they are in a very good mood to meet Saturday.
The matches between the two clubs are a regular visit, with more than 2,000 people often in Uzice, with no less interest in Cajetina. There are always a large number of visiting fans, who have already been announced to have a special place in the hall. However, it is often the case that within the families themselves, one member cheers for one and the other for the other team.
Either way, Freedom is in a really terrible series against its neighbors. It dates back to the time when both clubs competed in the Second Men's League of Serbia. Last season, everything was settled in Uzice in the final seconds, while at Zlatibor the host triumphed quite convincingly, adding a hundred.
The situation in the two camps is slightly different from the previous competition year. Freedom decided to start playing young forces in the Super League last year for the new season, taking on a loan from Dimitri Nikolic, Tadija Tadic and Vuk Djordjevic. That paid off the most, as the top two are currently statistically one of the best basketball players in the league. With Dusan Kutlesic and Tevin Foster, the Eras seem to have a pretty respectable lineup.
Zlatibor are not without weapons. The main threat against Uzice comes from Petar Vorkapic, but a lot of attention will have to be paid to Bogdan Riznic, who has long been among the Cajetinci, as well as Svetozar Popovic, who is currently recording an average of 10.8 assists per game.
Very interesting could be on Vozdovac, where OKK Belgrade will try to break the ice and reach the first win of the new season. The opponent, though, will not be easy, as the Clones will cross with the team of Novi Pazar competing in the regional ABA 2 league this season.
And it will be the home team who will play on the fatigue card of the away team, who only played a match against Dynamic, also in the Serbian capital, three days before this duel. In the previous two matches, besides the skills of the OKK Belgrade basketball players, they were not lucky either, as they were defeated after the extra time on both occasions after leading the last minute of the regular part of the game.
There have been a lot of changes in the composition of both teams, and it can be said that both, and the other are still making holes. At least for now, Klonfer stands out for Mihailo Jovičić and Aleksa Marković, while in Novi Pazar Tarik Brunčević and Aleksa Novaković are the "main" ones.
Last season, the Pazars did not have the best time in the "Mega Fectorium", as the rejuvenated OKK Belgrade team got them in a very important match when they were fighting for second place in the standings. They are far stronger today, so a team from the southwest could really have problems.
Another derby will be played in Aleksinac, at least according to the position of the teams on the table. After four rounds, home-grown Napredak is surprisingly in fourth place in the standings with only one defeat and against Dinamo will try to confirm that none of this is a surprise.
Indeed, the Aleksinians have made a stoic effort to bring the club as close as possible to the fans, a large number of season tickets have been sold and local basketball players, as usual, can expect nice support at home. Most are expected from Slavisa Bogavac, who has been the most effective member of this team so far, but attention should also be paid to Aleksandar Ilkic, who was brilliant in Tamis jersey last season.
Vrsac will be greeted at home by the shaken Metalac, who obviously feels the consequences of having entered the preparations for the new season much later than the others. For the time being, the Valjevo players have registered only one victory in the domestic championship on the domestic parquet, while the guests have twice been convincingly defeated. On the other hand, the team from Banat has entered the season much better than last season, so this time it hopes to be able to qualify for the Superliga.
Lastly, there is a clash between two teams from the bottom of the table. Kolubara will host the Vojvodina lantern, which in the previous round was very close to a surprising triumph against Vrsac. Lale got a big score behind, but failed to overwhelm the guests, who scored points from the free throw line a second before the end, and won a valuable triumph.

SERBIA BASKETBALL LEAGUE - ROUND 5

FridayDunav - Mladost Zemun 89:95

Saturday17.00: (4.40) OKK Belgrade (17.00) Novi Pazar (1.25) 18.00: (1.07) Vrsac (25.00) Metalac (8.50) 18.00: (1.20) Zlatibor (19.00) Freedom (5.00) 19.00: (1.80) Progress (14.50) Dynamic (2.15) 19.30: (1.25) Kolubara (17.00) Vojvodina (4.40)

Sunday19.00: Fighter - Tamis

Note:
Odds are subject to change





By: Srdjan TODOROVIC
